title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in withdrawn element work with satin and overcasting stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Seventy-one squares and bands of pattern as well as a deer and an alphabet in withdrawn element work in white.  The mouth and the eye of the deer are in colored silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in withdrawn element work with satin and overcasting stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-365.
